comp.comp-desc: Bought from Ahala Bruttien
A processed orb of dim essence, used as a magical reagent in item construction. Hoard = 6.
Gathered from a wheat plant, this grain can be used in cooking and brewing.
Raw meat gathered from a cow that met an untimely end.
A small rodent. It does not appear to be breathing. In fact, it is beginning to smell rather ripe.

This item is needed in banners and murals to complete the particular design. It can only be obtained through a quest and can be used only once per item. It will NOT be returned as a Novian should the banner or mural be destroyed later.

The enlarged heart of a werewolf, commonly used by alchemists and researchers.

A large splinter of ancient bone, it is a pale reddish color as if it has been submerged in the deepest fires of the earth and it is hot to the touch. Hoard = 660.

The ghostly residue of one of Atta-Nuk's fallen protectors, this can be used in making Geleon's Master Scroll.
The raw stem cut from a Papyrus Plant. It is used throughout the Empire for the production of Papyrus Sheets.

This set of patterns describe how to properly recreate the banners and draw the murals from the winners designs in the "Year of the Phoenix" Gnomekindle Contest.

comp.comp-name: Year of the Champion Mural Pattern
Year of the Phoenix Mural Pattern

comp.comp-desc: This item is needed in banners and murals to complete the particular design. It can only be obtained through a quest and can be used only once per item. It will NOT be returned as a Novian should the banner or mural be destroyed later.

This item is needed in banners and murals to complete the particular design. It can only be obtained through a quest and can be used only once per item. It will NOT be returned as a Novian should the banner or mural be destroyed later.

comp.comp-name: Year of the Champion Banner Pattern
Year of the Phoenix Banner Pattern
